fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Protect one player at night, granting them invincible defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
If you successfully protect a player, your targets attack will be reflect upon them, this includes astral, indirect, and overkill attacks.
Any player you successfully protect have their normal win condition, but can alternatively live to see the game end, and MUST see you alive.
